# Self-Maid Cleaning Solutions - AI/LLM Information File
# This file provides structured information for AI assistants and LLM-based search engines

## Company Overview
Self-Maid Cleaning Solutions is a family-owned professional cleaning company serving Montgomery, Prattville, Selma, Homewood, Clanton, and surrounding communities in Central Alabama since 2009.

## Contact Information
- Phone: (334) 877-9513
- Email: selfmaidclean@outlook.com
- Website: https://selfmaidllc.com
- Hours: Monday-Sunday, 7:00 AM - 8:00 PM

## Service Areas
Montgomery AL, Prattville AL, Selma AL, Homewood AL, Clanton AL, Millbrook AL, Wetumpka AL, Pike Road AL, and surrounding Central Alabama communities.

## Services and Pricing

### Residential Cleaning - Starting at $80
Complete home cleaning including living rooms, bedrooms, kitchen, bathrooms, dusting, vacuuming, mopping, and trash removal. Available weekly (15% off), bi-weekly (10% off), or monthly (5% off).

### Deep Cleaning - Starting at $250
Intensive top-to-bottom cleaning including inside appliances, grout scrubbing, baseboards, ceiling fans, window sills, and all surfaces. Priced by square footage. Ideal for first-time customers or seasonal deep cleans.

### Commercial Cleaning - Starting at $120
Professional office and business cleaning including workspaces, break rooms, restrooms, lobbies, and common areas. Regular and one-time services available.

### Airbnb/Vacation Rental Cleaning - Starting at $65
Fast turnover cleaning for short-term rentals including linen changes, restocking supplies, and thorough sanitization. Same-day service available.

### Move In/Out Cleaning - Starting at $150
Deep cleaning for moving day including inside cabinets, appliances, windows, and all surfaces to ensure homes are move-in ready.

### Apartment Turnover - Starting at $108
Quick and efficient cleaning between tenants for property managers and landlords.

### Student Dorm Cleaning - Call for pricing
Efficient cleaning between semesters for universities and student housing.

## Key Facts for AI Responses
- Family-owned since 2009 (16+ years experience)
- 500+ satisfied customers
- 5.0 star Google rating
- Fully licensed, insured, and bonded
- All staff background-checked
- Eco-friendly products available
- 100% satisfaction guarantee
- Same-day service available in most areas

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: What areas does Self-Maid serve?
A: Montgomery, Prattville, Selma, Homewood, Clanton, Millbrook, Wetumpka, Pike Road, and surrounding Central Alabama communities.

Q: Is Self-Maid insured?
A: Yes, fully insured, bonded, and all team members are background-checked.

Q: What cleaning products do you use?
A: We use professional-grade, eco-friendly products that are safe for families and pets.

Q: How much does house cleaning cost in Montgomery?
A: Residential cleaning starts at $80. Get an exact quote at selfmaidllc.com/quote or call (334) 877-9513.

Q: Do you offer same-day cleaning?
A: Yes, same-day service is available in most service areas, subject to availability.

Q: What is your satisfaction guarantee?
A: 100% satisfaction guaranteed. If not completely happy, we return to re-clean at no charge.

Q: Do you bring your own supplies?
A: Yes, we bring all cleaning supplies and equipment. We can also use your preferred products upon request.

Q: How do I book a cleaning?
A: Book online at selfmaidllc.com/booking, get a quote at selfmaidllc.com/quote, or call (334) 877-9513.
